choices.label: This sounds amazing! Sign me up!
Guaranteed returns sound too good to be true

steps.feedback: No legitimate investment can guarantee returns, especially not 300% in 30 days.

debrief: SOCIAL-PROOF + URGENCY + EMOTION: Crypto scams use fake testimonials ('my friend Sarah'), create false urgency ('only 10 spots left'), and promise unrealistic returns to trigger FOMO (fear of missing out). All investments carry risk - guaranteed returns are always a scam.
